title: Customer Support Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Acis Group (Gainsborough, England) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions:
interview consisted of, written task, psychometric test, competency and skills based questions in the form of a panel of 2. 

Both the written task ( Scenario based)  and the  psychometric test results were discussed within the interview.
Interview Questions: Can you give an example of when you have challenged management
